mapper.insert:
select accommodation_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into accommodation_comment(accommodation_comment_no, accommodation_comment_content, accommodation_comment_date, accommodation_comment_avg, accommodation_no, member_no) values(#{accommodationCommentNo}, #{accommodationCommentContent}, sysdate, #{accommodationCommentAvg}, #{accommodationNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.update: update accommodation_comment set accommodation_comment_content=#{accommodationContent}, accommodation_comment_avg=#{accommodationCommentAvg} where accommodation_comment_no=#{accommodationCommentNo} and accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.delete: delete from accommodation_comment where accommodation_comment_no=#{accommodationCommentNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
